name: The Fool
description: You may only use your non-dominant hand as long as you hold this card.
flavor: Don't you dare to spill your drink on this game!

name: Grandpa
description: You may not show your teeth while holding this card.

name: Caveman
description: As long as you hold this card, you can only say three words at a time.

name: Twitter
description: While holding this card you must start every sentence with 'hashtag'.

name: Knifes Edge
description:
Ask everyone to come up with any rule for this status card. Don't read the rest of this card out loud until they have.
Done? The card applies to the player who came up with the rule!

name: Knifes Edge
description:
Ask everyone to come up with any rule for this status card. Don't read the rest of this card out loud until they have.
Done? The effect that was chosen for this status card applies to you!

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Play Rock Paper Scissors once against everyone. Gain a bottle:bottle: for each win. Drink:beer: for each loss.

name: Redshirt
description: The person with the reddest shirt finishes their drink.
flavor: No officers or engineers were harmed in the making of this game.

name: Feminism, bitch!
description: Name 5 famous women from history. Dink:beer: once for each you fall short. Got all 5? Have 3 bottles:bottle:.

name: Go Home...
description: ... You're Drunk. Move to the Frat House.
flavor: Home is where the beer is

name: Lick Someone
description: You know, lick someone. Also, have a bottle:bottle:

name: Get Inked
description: Get someone to draw on you. Who, Where and What: You get to choose two, they choose the other.
flavor: Trust me, you don't want to leave out 'Where'.

name: Pickup
description: Use a pickup line on someone.
flavor: Did it hurt when you fell from heaven?

name: Something Cute?
description: Guess the color of everyones underwear. For each wrong guess,you drink:beer: once. For every correct guess, they drink:beer: twice.
flavor: I SEE LONDON, I SEE FRANCE
